thread.title: Craft beverages straight from the source in Yakima Valley
thread.title_full: Craft beverages straight from the source in Yakima Valley - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Katie Hammel
title: Craft beverages straight from the source in Yakima Valley
text:
Photo: Yakima Valley Tourism Mt. Adams looms over vineyards in the Yakima Valley. Mt. Adams looms over vineyards in the Yakima Valley.
While it’s easy to forget that winemaking, brewing and distilling all start with farming, in Washington’s Yakima Valley, the line from field to glass is a little shorter. Mt. Adams looms over vineyards in the Yakima Valley. Mt. Adams looms over vineyards in the Yakima Valley.
While it’s easy to forget that winemaking, brewing and distilling all start with farming, in Washington’s Yakima Valley, the line from field to glass is a little shorter.
